questions.question: Do a majority of men expect to spend more or less than $50 on a first date?
questions.answerText: 60% of men said they expect to spend less than $50 on a first date
questions.option1: Spend less than $50 on the first date
questions.option2: Spend more than $50 on the first date

questions.question: Do a majority of men prefer to pick up their date verses meet their date at a location?
questions.answerText: 35% of men prefer to pick up their dates verses 53% of men who would rather meet their dates at a loction. 12% of men prefer to get picked up for their date.
questions.option1: Yes. Prefer to pick up their date
questions.option2: No. Meet their date at a location

questions.question: If a date was not going well, would the average guy go on another date with the same person?
questions.answerText: Kinda ... 52% of men said they would go up to 2 to 3 dates with a person if the first date didn't go well
questions.option1: Yes. Would go on another date with that person
questions.option2: No. Would not go on another date with that person

questions.question: If a couple could not decide on what restaurant to eat at while on a date, would a majority of men make the final decision or prefer their date to make the final decision?
questions.answerText: 62% of men would make the final decision
questions.option2: No. Would like their date to make the final decision

questions.question: Do a VAST majority of men like to tell their friends about a date they are going on?
questions.answerText: Actually, only 50% of men would tell their friends about a date. This is different than 85% of women who said they tell their friends about upcoming dates.
questions.option1: Yes. A vast majority of men tell their friends
questions.option2: No. A vast majority of men do not tell their friends

questions.question: If the parents of a guy disapprove of the person they are dating, do you believe that guy will continue dating that person?
questions.answerText: 81% of men would continue to date a person even if their parents disapprove
questions.option1: No. Would NOT continue to date that person
questions.option2: Yes. Would continue to date that person

questions.question: On a first date, would men rather know if there will be a SECOND date or would men rather know about past relationships?
questions.answerText: 55% of men would rather want to know know if there will be a SECOND date, but that leaves a close 45% that would want to know about past relationships
questions.option1: Would rather know if there is a SECOND date
questions.option2: Would rather know about past relationships

questions.question: Do men believe that the check at the end of a date should be split between the two people?
questions.answerText: 64% of men believe they should pay for the check
questions.option1: Yes men believe the check should be split evenly
questions.option2: No men believe they should pay for the check at the end of the date

questions.question: If the friends of a guy disapprove of their date, would they continue to see that person?
questions.answerText: 88% of men would continue to see a person their friends disapprove of
questions.option1: No. They would NOT continue to see that person.
questions.option2: Yes. They would continue to see that person.

questions.question: Do a majority of men consider themselves funny?
questions.answerText: 69% of women consider themselves funny
questions.option2: No. Do not consider themselves funny

questions.question: Do a majority of men play hard to get?
questions.answerText: Only 37% of men play hard to get
questions.option1: Yes. Majority play hard to get
questions.option2: No. Majority do not play hard to get

questions.question: Do you believe the average man likes to become physical on the first date?
questions.answerText: 68% of men do NOT like to become physical on the first date
questions.option1: Yes. Physical on the first date
questions.option2: No. Does not become physical

questions.question: Do a VAST majority of men believe they are above average in the bedroom?
questions.answerText: 75% of men believe they are above average in the bedroom. Only 50% of women thought the same
questions.option1: Yes. Above average in the bedroom
questions.option2: No. Not above average in the bedroom

questions.question: Do a majority of men consider themselves flirty?
questions.answerText: 56% of men consider themselves flirty
questions.option2: No. Do not consider themselves flirty

questions.question: Have a majority of men ever made an excuse to leave a date early?
questions.answerText: 63% of men said they have NEVER made an excuse to leave a date early
questions.option1: No. Never made an excuse to leave a date early
questions.option2: Yes. Made an excuse to leave a date early

questions.question: When men were asked 'Have you ever dated somebody who was already in a relationship?', what do you believe was the majority of their responses?
questions.answerText: 75% said they have dated somebody already in a relationship?
questions.option1: Yes. Dated a person who was already in a relationship
questions.option2: No. Never dated a person who was already in a relationship

questions.question: If a date lied about their sexual history and was a virgin, would the majority of men be offended??
questions.answerText: 68% of men said they would not be offended.
questions.option2: No. Not offended

questions.question: If a date lied about their sexual history and had many past sexual encounters, would the majority of men be offended?
questions.answerText: 62% would not be offended
questions.option2: No. Not offended

questions.question: Have a majority of men lied on a date?
questions.answerText: 56% of men have lied on a date
questions.option2: No

questions.question: When men were asked if they thought their date has to dress 'fashionably', what do you believe their response was?
questions.answerText: 79% of men responded that dressing 'fashionably' was not important
questions.option2: Date does not need to dress 'fashionably'

questions.question: Would a vast majority of men date somebody 5 years older than themselves?
questions.answerText: Close to 82% of men expressed they would date somebody 5 years older than themselves
questions.option2: No. Would not date somebody 5 years older

questions.question: Would a majority of men date somebody 5 years younger than themselves
questions.answerText: 93% of men said they would not date somebody younger than them by 5 years
questions.option1: Yes. Date somebody 5 years younger themselves
questions.option2: No. Would not date somebody 5 years younger themselves

questions.question: If a date lied about their age and was actually 3 years younger, would the average man be offended?
questions.answerText: 82% said they would continue to see that person
questions.option2: Yes. Would have been offended

questions.question: If a date lied about their age and was actually 3 years older, would the average man be offended?
questions.answerText: 64% said they would continue to see them.
questions.option2: No. Would not be offended

questions.question: If a man found out their date was poor, do you believe the average man would want to go another date with that person?
questions.answerText: 71% of man said they would go on another date with that person
questions.option1: Yes. Would go on another date
questions.option2: No. Would not go on another date

questions.question: If a man found out their date had no friends, do you believe the average man would want to go on another date with that person?
questions.answerText: 61% of men said they would not go another date with that person
questions.option1: Yes. The average man would go on another date
questions.option2: No. The average man would not go on another date

questions.question: Would the average man wait 30 minutes for a late date?
questions.answerText: 86% said they would wait 30 minutes for a late date
questions.option2: No. Would not wait 30 minutes

questions.question: If the friends of a man expressed their date was not attractive, would the average man continue to go on the date?
questions.answerText: 86% of man would continue to go on the date
questions.option1: Yes. Continue to go on the date
questions.option2: No. Not continue to go on the date

questions.question: Would a VAST majority of men go dancing on the first date?
questions.answerText: Only 50% of men would go dancing on the first date
questions.option1: Yes. Go dancing on the first date
questions.option2: No. Would not go dancing on the first date

questions.question: Would the average man eat dinner with their date's family, as a first date?
questions.answerText: 62% of men said they would eat dinner with the family as a first date
questions.option1: Yes. First date with the date's family
questions.option2: No. No first date with the date's family

questions.question: If a man found a date boring, would the average man would go on another date with that person?
questions.answerText: Only 49% of men would go another date
questions.option2: No. Would not go on another date

questions.question: If a date did not graduate high school, would the average man consider it a negative or would they not care?
questions.answerText: 81% of man would NOT consider it a negative
questions.option2: It is not a negative

questions.question: Would the average man date a friend's ex?
questions.answerText: 54% would date a friend's ex
questions.option2: No. Would not date a friend's ex

questions.question: If a man embarrassed himself on a date and you laughed at them, would the average man be offended?
questions.answerText: 58% of men said they would be offended
questions.option2: No. Would not be offended

questions.question: Do men prefer to date a person with muscular or non-muscular build?
questions.answerText: 65% prefer a date without a muscular build
questions.option2: Non-muscular build

questions.question: Does the average man get nervous before a date?
questions.answerText: 81% of men get nervous before a date
questions.option1: Yes. Get nervous before a date
questions.option2: No. Don't get nervous before a date

questions.question: If date smelled bad, would the average man let their date know?
questions.answerText: 62% would not tell their date they smell bad
questions.option2: No. Would not tell their date

questions.question: Have a majority of men lied to cancel a date?
questions.answerText: 62% of men have lied to cancel a date
questions.option1: Yes. Lied to cancel a date
questions.option2: No. Never lied to cancel a date

questions.question: Do you believe an average man needs more than 1 dates to know if they like a person or just 1 date?
questions.answerText: 95% of men need more than 1 date.
questions.option2: No. Just 1 date

questions.question: What is more important to men: 'Attraction' or 'Intelligence'
questions.answerText: 53% of men said intelligence is more important
questions.option2: Intelligence

questions.question: Would most men date somebody who smokes cigarettes?
questions.answerText: 68% of men would not date somebody who smokes cigarettes
questions.option1: Yes to somebody who smokes cigarettes
questions.option2: No to somebody who smokes cigarettes

questions.question: What is more important to men: 'Gets along with your family ' vs 'Gets along with your friends'
questions.answerText: 74% of men said getting along with his family is more important
questions.option2: Gets along with his friends

questions.question: Do most men consider themselves an above average dater?
questions.answerText: 68% of men belive they are above average daters
questions.option2: No. Not above average

questions.question: Do most men consider themselves more attractive than the average man?
questions.answerText: 68% of men consider themselves more attractive than the average man.
questions.option2: No. Less attractive

questions.question: How many people does the average man date at one time?
questions.answerText: 79% said just one person at a time
questions.option2: Just one person at a time

questions.question: When men were asked if their last date was arranged online or not online, what do you believe was their response?
questions.answerText: 53% percent said their last date was met not online
questions.option1: Most said they met their last date online
questions.option2: Most said they did NOT meet their date online

questions.question: Would the average man be comfortable dating somebody who made 4X the income of himself?
questions.answerText: 68% of men said they would be comfortable dating someobody who made 4X their income
questions.option2: No. Uncomfortable

questions.question: Do you believe the average man would be comfortable taking $100 to go on a date with somebody that repulsed them?
questions.answerText: 63% said they would be uncomfortable
questions.option2: No. Uncomfortable

questions.question: Would a vast majority of men prefer a mate with a 'Sense of humor' over 'Good hygiene'?
questions.answerText: 61% of men prefer a 'Sense of humor' over 'Good hygiene'
questions.option1: Yes. Prefer a 'Sense of humor' over 'Good hygiene'
questions.option2: No. Do not prefer a 'Sense of humor' over 'Good hygiene'

questions.question: What is more important to men: 'Their mate's religion' vs 'Their mate's education level'
questions.answerText: 78% believe education level is more important
questions.option2: Education level

questions.question: What is more important to men: 'Being healthy' vs 'Being empathetic'
questions.answerText: 61% belive being healthy is more important
questions.option2: Being empathetic

questions.question: What is more attractive to a man: 'Somebody who can stand up for themselves' vs 'Make people around them comfortable'
questions.answerText: 74% find it attractive when their date can make people around them comfortable
questions.option2: Stand up for themselves

questions.question: What is more important to men: 'The man is sexually attracted to their partner' vs 'Their partner is sexually attracted to the man'?
questions.answerText: 65% of men prefer somebody they are attracted to vs their partner being attracted to them
questions.option1: The man is sexually attracted to their partner
questions.option2: Their partner is sexually attracted to the man

questions.question: Would the average man date somebody with a past drug problem?
questions.answerText: 61% said they would not date somebody with a past drug problem
questions.option1: Yes. They would date somebody with a past drug problem
questions.option2: No. They would not date somebody with a past drug problem

questions.question: What is more important to men: 'Sexually attractive mate' vs 'A good sense of humor'?
questions.answerText: 61% of men would prefer a 'Sexually attractive mate'
questions.option2: Sense of humor

questions.question: Which is more attractive: 'Wild in the bedroom' vs 'Sensitive in the bedroom'
questions.answerText: 57% prefer wild in the bedroom
questions.option2: Sensitive in the bedroom

questions.question: Which is more attractive: 'Their date being a good singer' vs 'Their date being a good dancer'
questions.answerText: 52% prefer a good dancer
questions.option2: Good dancer is more attractive

questions.question: Which of these two would romantically arouse a man more: 'Complimented with sweet words' vs 'A physical caress'?
questions.answerText: 70% said a physical caress would be more romantically arousing
questions.option2: A physical caress

questions.question: On average which does a man prefer his partner to have? A higher education degree or a job?
questions.answerText: 58% of men said they prefer their partner to have a job
questions.option2: A job

questions.question: Which one of the two options would an average man find more arousing: 'Finger tickling their palm' vs 'A kiss on the cheek' ?
questions.answerText: 67% said a kiss on the cheek
questions.option2: A kiss on the cheek

questions.question: Which do men find more romantic: 'A sweet text' or 'A sweet whisper'?
questions.answerText: 67% said a sweet whisper
questions.option2: A sweet whisper

questions.question: Which do more men find more important: 'Their date's religious views' or 'Their date's political views'?
questions.answerText: 60% said that religious views are more important
questions.option2: Political views are more important

questions.question: Which do men find more important in a potential partner: 'They smell good' or 'They have good hair'?
questions.answerText: 70% said they prefer their partners to smell good
questions.option2: They smell good

questions.question: Which do men find more romantic: 'They can cook' or 'They are clean' ?
questions.answerText: 57% said they are clean
questions.option2: They are clean

questions.question: Which do men find more romantic: 'They are sexually open' or 'They are sexually sensitive'?
questions.answerText: 73% said they are sexually open
questions.option2: They are sexually sensitive

questions.question: Which do men find more important in a potential partner: 'They have attractive clothing style' or 'They have a nice body'?
questions.answerText: 87% said a nice body is more important
questions.option2: Nice body

questions.question: Which do men find more romantic: 'Sensual rub down the chest' or 'Sensual rub on the thigh'?
questions.answerText: 57% prefer a sensual rub on the thigh
questions.option2: Sensual rub on the thigh
